original_text: Someone gave me a stick, like the sticks that people use to measure things. He told me, ‘Go and measure the size of the temple and the altar. Also count the number of people who worship God there.
korean_text: 또 내게 지팡이 같은 갈대를 주며 말하기를 일어나서 하나님의 성전과 제단과 그 안에서 경배하는 자들을 측량하되

sentences.original_text: like the sticks that people use to measure things
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 물건을 재는 데 사용하는 막대기와 같은 것이었다

sentences.original_text: Go and measure the size of the temple
Also count the number of people
